about_the_game:
"Siege of Shadows" is an intense tower defense survival game where strategy, skill, and quick thinking are your keys to victory. In a world overrun by relentless waves of enemies, your mission is to build, upgrade, and defend your base at all costs.

As hordes of increasingly powerful enemies approach, you’ll need to strategically place and enhance a variety of defensive towers, each with unique abilities and strengths. Adapt your defenses, upgrade your towers, and fortify your base to withstand the escalating onslaught.

Key Features:

Tower Upgrades: Upgrade your towers with powerful enhancements to increase their strength, range.

Survival Mode: Test your endurance in an endless survival mode where every wave gets tougher, pushing your skills and strategy to their limits.

Multiple Environments: Defend your base in different biomes, from , each offering unique challenges and enemy types.

Prepare for an epic battle of survival. Will you rise to the challenge and defend your base, or will the relentless hordes overrun you? The fate of your stronghold is in your hands!
